resources.string: Please check data network on your device. Error: Unknown Host
Data may not be valid or server has issues
Some Problems in Network Or Web-Services,try again...
Amount has been credited to your account. Please enter the same amount (Ex 1.104)

Liability of merchant for all chargebacks including fraud and all chargebacks including fraud and other transactions is 100%
I / We hereby confirm that I / We have been enrolled under the special scheme offered by Axis Bank as per which we commit to maintain `____________________ monthly / quarterly average balance for the above discounted MDR.
I / We further confirm that if the aforementioned monthly / quarterly average balance is not maintained, within the charge cycle period (15th of the current month to 14th of the next month), the Bank shall have full right to levy non-maintenance of balance charges and penal tariff in my / our account without any further notice.
PAYMENT TIME FRAME The Bank will pay the Merchant in 3 days following the day on which the transactions are settled on the EDC less the discount for all the card transactions processed and accepted by the Bank.
I / We accept and agree to the above charges and payment time frame.
I / We certify that the information and particulars provided above are true and correct and that the person/s signing this Application has / have full legal authority to do so, on behalf of my / our Merchant Establishment. I / We have read and understood the terms & conditions in the separately signed Merchant Agreement and agree to abide by the same. This Application is an offer by Axis Bank to me / us as a prospective merchant and does not amount to acceptance or enlisting of my / our Merchant Establishment for the said facility, till the Bank is satisfied with the Application. This Application is accepted pending scrutiny & verification by the Bank or their appointed agent(s), and the Bank reserves the right to decline or cancel any application without assigning any reason whatsoever, and the Bank’s decision will be final and binding on me / us. I / We, by way of submission of this Application and the information requested therein, have evinced interest in enlisting for Merchant Acquiring Services, the scope of which will be governed by the Merchant Establishment Agreement that has been separately signed. The Bank reserves the rights to directly / indirectly verify all the information stated in this Application and to seek credit references.
If at any stage it is brought to the notice of the Bank that any information submitted herein is suppressed / incorrect / false, or that it has been given with a view to willfully mislead the Bank, the Application is liable to be rejected and the Merchant Establishment Agreement shall also be terminated forthwith, without revoking the Bank’s rights to proceed legally against the Merchant Establishment and / or the business owners.
I / We agree that I / We will not require any Cardholder to pay any surcharge, to pay any part of the discount, whether through any increase in price or otherwise, or to pay any similar finance charge in connection with the transaction made by any card for purchase made at my / our Merchant Establishment using Axis Bank terminal. If at any stage it is brought to the notice of the Bank that such a charge is being applied by me / us, the relationship can be immediately terminated by the Bank.
I / We agree that I / We will not cause the magnetic stripe of a payment card to be read twice or more for the same transaction, if the said card has been dipped / swiped at the EDC / any other Cardholder Interaction Interface and has received an authorization for the transaction, be the second swipe made for closing the transaction at the my / our Electronic Cash Register (ECR) or recording / matching / dispensing the inventory against the transaction at Point-of-Sale (PoS) or other equipment, or for the my / our loyalty program or for any other purposes, except under the Bank's prior authority to do so given to the me / us in writing.
I / We agree to settle the batch for Visa Electron cards in 5 calendar days (including both transaction date and settlement date) and for all other debit, credit and prepaid cards (VISA / MasterCard / NPCI / card association acquired by Bank) in 7 calendar days (including both transaction date and settlement date). The Bank shall be entitled at any time to hold back payment for transactions settled beyond these time frames for a period of 180 days. I / We agree to not pass the discount range charged on cards to cardholder.In event of any change of address. I / We undertake to intimate the bank within 20 days, failing which the bank shall not be held responsible for any material or incidental liability caused o the Merchant as a result of the same.
I / We further agree to accept information about new products, services and features introduced or offered by the bank from time to time via phone / email / SMS / direct communication from a bank official.
Low transacting charges (for the month with volumes below \u20B9 25,000/-)
Late settlement charges (for delay over 5 days)
0.95% of the batch value or \u20B9 750 whichever higher
Back dated / Duplicate statement (including international transactions statement)
• High and low risk business check
• Domain name verification and integrity check
